name: Simon Says Piano
description:
Introducing SIMON SAYS PIANO, the most entertaining memory game in the App Store! Simon plays a few notes that are clues to the MYSTERY SONG. If you repeat the same notes correctly on the piano, Simon will playback the entire MYSTERY SONG for you to enjoy! Have loads of fun using music to improve your memory skills. Download SIMON SAYS PIANO now and see for yourself!

Demo Url : https://youtu.be/ow7PReKQqnM
